description.value:
Frequency once per hour

You can cast a 3rd-level @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.4YnON9JHYqtLzccu]{Summon Animal} as an innate spell, but only to summon a @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.pathfinder-bestiary-2.Actor.xxP5FJotshmUQNtY]{Black Bear}. At 10th level, the summon animal spell is heightened to 4th level, and you can summon a @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.pathfinder-bestiary.Actor.CJP3GGBXuGgkaj6C]{Grizzly Bear}. At 12th level, your summon animal innate spell is heightened to 5th level, and you can summon a @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.pathfinder-bestiary-2.Actor.UqFObUjgFAlWrriA]{Polar Bear}. At 14th level, it's heightened to 6th level, and you can summon a @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.pathfinder-bestiary.Actor.b8NQkby4QV4uOqFT]{Cave Bear}.
